content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements the argyle design on this hat came after designing the chevron peaks slouch with this same technique last winter i designed the argyle christmas stocking but ran out of time to publish this hat pattern things worked out perfectly and we used it for mmcal #17 **sizes included** toddler child teen/adult small adult medium/large **options** there are 2 hat band styles included in this pattern as shown in the photos **styles** beanie slouch & messy bun styles are included in this pattern **yarn** i used lion brand wool ease touch of alpaca and pound of love for my samples this pattern was designed for our 17th mini-mystery crochet along all mmcal projects are smaller projects and don t take too long to complete join us find all details of our mini-mystery crochet alongs in the information guide on the blog click here 2 to read that short guide find the material list & schedule for the mmcal here https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/mini-mystery-crochet-along-17/ beanie slouch & messy bun are
